title: CSE 2111 - Modeling and Problem Solving with Spreadsheets and Databases
description: Spreadsheet and database modeling/programming concepts and techniques to solve business related problems; efficient/effective data handling, computational analysis and decision support. Additional topics: computer concepts, networking, project integration. Prereq: Math 1130 (130) or above. Not open to students with credit for 1111 (101), 1112 (105), or 200. This course is available for EM credit. GE quant reason math and logical anly course.
